Event.EventArg: "By the way, I've been meaning to ask.
What exactly ARE you wearing, anyway?"
of the Sacrificial Princess, of courseÅc

"ÅcOn second thought, take it off right now."

(If it's supposed to be a religious outfit, then why is it designed
